footer.address: Address: Av. Avaroa s/n, Pucarani, Provincia Los Andes, Bolivia.
footer.copyright: 2024 UAC Pucarani | Desarrollado por Axl y sus amigos

lasSecciones.descripcion_bienvenida: The Pucarani Academic Unit invites you to be part of a unique educational experience. Discover programs designed to boost your professional training, with a deep commitment to the well-being of our society. We are proud to shape future professionals who stand out not only for their knowledge but also for their dedication to service.

fisioterapia.descripcion: The Physiotherapy and Kinesiology program focuses on the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of physical injuries and movement disorders. Students are trained in rehabilitation techniques to improve patients' quality of life and optimize their physical recovery.

enfermeria.descripcion: This program prepares students for the comprehensive care of patients in various health settings. Graduates acquire skills in medical care techniques, health promotion, preventive care, along with training in ethics and social responsibility.

explora: Explore a world of educational opportunities and personal development in our community.
descripcion: The Unidad Académica Campesina de Pucarani, part of the Universidad Católica Boliviana "San Pablo", has the mission of training professionals committed to social well-being, sustainable development, and the preservation of community values. Our website has been designed to facilitate access to academic resources, institutional information, and student services.
union: Being part of UAC Pucarani is much more than studying. It is about forming bonds, contributing to social development, and building a better future for everyone. Explore our portal, learn about our activities and services, and be part of our mission to make the world a better place.
